
Changelog
=========

1.0.0 (2019-09-25)
------------------

* Template rendering is working
* Added YAML data file support
* Improved program verbosity

0.1.0 (2019-09-21)
------------------

* Drop support for Python 2
* Implement middlewares

0.0.0 (2019-09-21)
------------------

* First release on PyPI
